name: Life of the Party (WiddleMedia)
description:
Keep the good vibes alive!

There's a party going on, and it's THE place to be. Can you have a good time?

Made for Ludum Dare 46 Jam.

Check out the OST, made special for this jam! Wow! Find it at:
https://simultannihilator.bandcamp.com/album/ld46-life-of-the-party-ost
